      • consolePrint

        public void consolePrint(java.lang.String msg)
        Parameters:
        msg - String a message to display in the servers console. This method allows us to print output to the server's console.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
        resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized. This method initializes the tableview and empties server console on screen load

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the primary stage for this application, onto which the application scene can be set. Applications may create other stages, if needed, but they will not be primary stages. This method loads the fxml, starts listening for click and drag events on the main program screen.
